ModMetaData.name: Dress Patients (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Eagle0600, Dragonissa
ModMetaData.description:
Creates a new job to dress patients in clothing of your choice.
With a colonist selected, right click on the patient and choose "Dress <name>" from the drop-down menu, then select your choice of apparel from your stockpile. The selected pawn will fetch the apparel and dress the patient in it.
